com.btmatthews.utils.monitor

Interface Logger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRunMojo, AbstractServerMojo, AbstractStopMojo

    public interface Logger
    Implemented by objects that write error and information messages to log files.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void logError(String message)
      Write an error message to the log file.
      void logError(String message, Throwable cause)
      Write an error message to the log file.
      void logInfo(String message)
      Write an information message to the log file.

    • Method Detail

      • logInfo

        void logInfo(String message)
        Write an information message to the log file.
        Parameters:
        message - The information message.

      • logError

        void logError(String message)
        Write an error message to the log file.
        Parameters:
        message - The error message.

      • logError

        void logError(String message,
            Throwable cause)
        Write an error message to the log file.
        Parameters:
        message - The error message.
        cause - The exception that is associated with the error message.
